title: DEWA outlines easy steps for installing Solar PV Panels on rooftops to generate electricity (Dubai ...
text: ( Source : Dubai Electricity and Water Authority ) Sun, 25 Oct 2015 Dubai Electricity and Water Authority (DEWA) has outlined easy steps to install photovoltaic systems in homes and buildings to generate solar power. This is part of Shams
